column1: English Sent: The movement of these plates have changed the position and size of the continents over millions of years.
Hindi Tansl: ina pletoM meM lAKoM_varRoM_se ho rahI gawi ke kAraNa mahAxvIpoM kI sWiwi waWA AkAra meM parivarwana AyA hE.
Anu Translation:  ina pleta kI gawiviXi xasa lAKa meM varRa mahAxvIpa kI sWiwi Ora AkAra baxala cukI hE
